about_the_game:
Toposim South Asia for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11/19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for South Asia, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

VFR flying over South Asia has never been more realistic with lakes, mountains and ground undulations all where they should be.

Please note this pack corrects the default terrain mesh and does not include any textures.

This pack includes terrain mesh for the following countries:

  • Sri Lanka
  • Bangladesh
  • India
  • Bhutan
  • Maldives
  • Pakistan
  • Afghanistan
  • British Indian Ocean Territory
  • Nepal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

short_description: Toposim South Asia for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11/19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for South Asia, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.
